alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:01PM EDT until July 20 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Huron County in north central Ohio... Northeastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Southern Erie County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bellevue, or 11 miles west of Norwalk, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Norwalk, Bellevue, New London, Milan, Northern Milan, Wakeman, Monroeville, Berlin Heights, North Fairfield and Flat Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
